mapper.select: SELECT * from tbl_goods WHERE gdsName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.cateCode = #{cateCode} OR g.cateCode = #{cateCode} + 1

select g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, g.cateCode, c.cateCodeRef, c.cateName, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsImg, gdsDate, g.gdsImg, g.gdsThumbImg from tbl_goods g inner join goods_category c on g.cateCode = c.cateCode where g.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart (cartNum, userId, gdsNum, cartStock) values (nextval(tbl_cart_seq), #{userId}, #{gdsNum}, #{cartStock})
mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by c.cartNum desc) as num, c.cartNum, c.userId, c.gdsNum, c.cartStock, c.addDate, g.gdsName, g.gdsPrice, g.gdsImg, g.gdsDate from tbl_cart c inner join tbl_goods g on c.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where c.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_order(orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhon, amount, gdsNum, gdsName, gdsPrice, gdsStock) values (#{orderId}, #{userId}, #{orderRec}, #{userAddr1}, #{userAddr2}, #{userAddr3}, #{orderPhon}, #{amount}, #{gdsNum}, #{gdsName}, #{gdsPrice}, #{gdsStock})
mapper.select: select orderId, userId, orderRec, userAddr1, userAddr2, userAddr3, orderPhon, amount, orderDate from tbl_order where userId = #{userId}

o.orderId, o.userId,o.gdsNum o.gdsName, o.gdsPrice, o.gdsStock, o.amount, g.gdsImg, g.gdsDate from tbl_order o inner join tbl_goods g on o.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where o.userId = #{userId} and o.orderId = #{orderId}
select b.bno, b.title, b.content, b.userId, b.gdsNum, b.regDate, g.gdsNum, g.gdsDate, g.gdsImg from tbl_board as b inner join tbl_goods as g on b.gdsNum = g.gdsNum where b.gdsNum = #{gdsNum}
